bookAuthors: Yukito Kishiro, Fred Burke, Sterling Bell, Matt Thorn
Plot: Yukito Kishiro blurs the lines between human and machine in the sci-fi/action adventure Battle Angel Alita. Daisuke Ido, a talented cybernetic doctor, finds the head of a cyborg in a junk heap. When he rebuilds her body, Alita's only clue to her past surfaces-her deadly fighting instincts! And now she is determine to find out the truth about who she once was...
Characters: Alita, Makaku, Gonzu, Zapan, Daisuke Ido
